question:
[Judy] loves her son [Lawrence] very much. He loves her, too. [Michele] went to her son [Gino]'s House [Gordon] bought to dress for his father [Larry] [Gordon] took his Aunt [Michele] out for her favorite meal [Dana] and her son [Joseph] made hot dogs. [Joseph]'s brother [Larry] ate one. [Jami] took her brother [Manuel] and other brother [Gino] with her to eat pasta at a pasta buffet. [Manuel] went to lunch with his aunt [Judy].
Question: How is [Lawrence] related to [Dana]?

- [Jami] took her brother [Manuel] and other brother [Gino] with her to eat pasta at a pasta buffet. 
- [Manuel] went to lunch with his aunt [Judy].

Step 2: Identify the relationship between the family members
- [Judy] is the mother of [Lawrence].
- [Michele] is the mother of [Gino].
- [Gordon] is the son of [Larry] and the nephew of [Michele].
- [Dana] is the mother of [Joseph] and [Larry].
- [Joseph] is the brother of [Larry].
- [Jami] is the sister of [Manuel] and [Gino].
- [Manuel] is the nephew of [Judy].

Step 3: Determine the relationship between [Lawrence] and [Dana]
- [Lawrence] is the son of [Judy].
- [Dana] is the mother of [Joseph] and [Larry].
- Therefore, [Lawrence] is the nephew of [Dana].

By following these steps, you can determine the relationship between [Lawrence] and [Dana] based on the information provided in the story.
